title: What do Spirit Halloween stores do for 11 months of the year when Halloween is  over? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have worked for Spirit for the past 3 years. They are owned by Spencer Gifts. Off season the physical stores are closed (they typically open in August and close right after Halloween). Any remaining Inventory (there usually isn’t very much) is returned to the warehouse. Some is solid online, some is disposed of and some (classic costumes and decor) is held until next year.

First thing they do is have offer every costume, and accessory, in their stores, for sale at a discount. Usually 2 days, only. Then they inventory, and reshelf any left overs. Then they acquire or make more costumes and accessories And of course they sell, all year, online. As do their competitors. . Get on their email list.
